plot: The philosophy of a banana split is one of sweet excess. When this gay man substitutes a sunbather for those three scoops of vanilla, chocolate and strawberry one wonders just how many of the seven deadly sins can be fit into one dish.
title: Banana Split
plot_es: The philosophy of a banana split is one of sweet excess. When this gay man substitutes a sunbather for those three scoops of vanilla, chocolate and strawberry one wonders just how many of the seven deadly sins can be fit into one dish.
plot_en: The philosophy of a banana split is one of sweet excess. When this gay man substitutes a sunbather for those three scoops of vanilla, chocolate and strawberry one wonders just how many of the seven deadly sins can be fit into one dish.
